title: Cisco, Citrix, and Fortinet Among New Verified Terraform Providers
content:
The HashiCorp Terraform provider ecosystem continues to grow rapidly. Only a couple of months ago, we announced that the total number of Terraform providers had crossed the 1,000 threshold. Today, that number has topped 1,300. This fast growth is good news for everyone hoping to use infrastructure as code to deploy and manage infrastructure across products in multi-cloud environments.

»New Verified Provider Additions

This month, the total number of verified Terraform providers has surpassed 150. Verified providers have achieved a higher level of maturity and confidence by going through our partner onboarding process. Today, we welcome the HashiCorp technology partners who have joined our verified provider program within the past five months.

»1Password

1Password is a password manager that makes it simple to create and share unique, strong passwords. More than 80,000 companies, including 25% of Fortune 100 companies such as IBM, as well as technology leaders like Slack and Dropbox, trust 1Password to secure their business. The 1Password provider allows users to manage items in their 1Password vault via Terraform.

»3DS Outscale

3DS Outscale, the cloud subsidiary of Dassault Systèmes, focuses on trustworthiness in its operations as a multi-region IaaS cloud provider. 3DS OUTSCALE is committed to corporate social responsibility (CSR) and was awarded the LUCIE ISO 26000 CSR label for its sustainable, responsible, and inclusive actions.

»Backblaze

Backblaze Cloud Storage platform offers backup built for ease of use, so you can focus on safeguarding files and systems, running applications, and doing more. They store more than an exabyte of data for customers including American Public Television, PagerDuty, and Patagonia.

»Cisco ASA

Cisco ASA is the core operating system for the Cisco ASA (adaptive security appliance) family. It delivers enterprise-class firewall capabilities for ASA devices in an array of form factors — standalone appliances, blades, and virtual appliances — for any distributed network environment.

»Cisco FMC

Cisco FMC is the administrative nerve center for managing critical Cisco network security solutions. It provides complete and unified management over firewalls, application control, intrusion prevention, URL filtering, and advanced malware protection.

»Cisco SDWAN

Cisco SDWAN powered by Viptela/IOS XE is a highly secure, cloud-scale architecture that is open, programmable, and scalable. Through this Cisco Terraform provider, you can quickly establish an SD-WAN overlay fabric. Use it to connect datacenters, branches, campuses, and colocation facilities to improve network speed, security, and efficiency.

»Cisco Tetration

Cisco Tetration helps you achieve the security required for today's heterogeneous multi-cloud environments with Cisco Secure Workload (formerly Tetration). Protect workloads across any cloud, application, and workload, anywhere. Automate and implement a secure zero trust model for micro-segmentation based on application behavior and telemetry.

»Citrix

Citrix builds a secure, unified digital workspace technology that helps organizations deliver a consistent workspace experience wherever work needs to get done. With Citrix, users get a seamless work experience and IT has a unified platform to secure, manage, and monitor diverse technologies in complex cloud environments.

»CloudScale

CloudScale is a Swiss cloud provider, headquartered in Zurich and offering infrastructure as a service (IaaS). cloudscale.ch focuses on high availability and performance, combined with a wide range of security features, integration with the most popular DevOps tools, and the assurance that all infrastructure is operated exclusively in Switzerland.

»CodeFresh

CodeFresh is a Docker-native CI/CD platform to instantly build, test and deploy Docker images. Thousands of companies — from startups to Fortune 500 enterprises — use CodeFresh to help build powerful, scalable CI/CD pipelines.

»Cohesity

Cohesity develops software that allows IT professionals to backup, manage, and gain insights from their data, across multiple systems or cloud providers.

»ConsenSys

ConsenSys is a blockchain Ethereum software company. The ConsenSys product suite, composed of Infura, Quorum, Truffle, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for the company’s clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets.

»Datastax

Datastax delivers an open, multi-cloud stack, purpose-built for modern data apps. Datastax is making Cassandra ready for millions of developers through simple APIs and is committed to delivering the multi-cloud serverless database: DataStax Astra.

»DNSimple

DNSimple provides essential services for every internet-connected system: domain registration, managed DNS, a powerful automation API, one-click DNS services, SSL certificates, and more. All domains at DNSimple are served through a global Anycast network, with multiple locations around the world. To increase security and availability, DNSimple provides a DNS DDoS protection service, and secondary DNS via inbound and outbound AXFR zone transfers.

»Elastic

Elastic is the company behind the Elastic Stack — Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash. From stock quotes to Twitter streams, Apache logs to WordPress blogs, Elastic helps people explore and analyze their data differently using the power of search.

»Fortinet

Fortinet secures large enterprise, service provider, and government organizations around the world. Fortinet empowers its customers with intelligent, seamless protection across the expanding attack surface and the tools to take on ever-increasing performance requirements of the borderless network — today and into the future. Fortinet now has two verified providers.

»Illumio

Illumio stops breaches from becoming cyber disasters. Illumio Core and Illumio Edge automate policy enforcement to stop cyberattacks and ransomware from spreading across applications, containers, clouds, data centers, and endpoints. They combine intelligent visibility to detect threats with security enforcement.

»Infracost

Infracost creates cloud cost estimates for infrastructure as code in pull requests, so developers know how much their cloud resources will cost before launching them. It can be run in CLI, or in CI where it leaves a comment in the pull request that might say, for example, “this change will increase your AWS bill by 25% next month” with a detailed breakdown. This creates a more cost-aware engineering organization.

»LogicMonitor

LogicMonitor is a SaaS-based performance monitoring platform for enterprise IT that provides visibility into infrastructure and application performance. LogicMonitor’s automated discovery, preconfigured alert thresholds, and customizable dashboards come together to give IT teams speed, flexibility, and actionable insights.

»Ngrok

Ngrok is a software-defined network edge fronting your web services running any cloud or behind the firewall.

»Nirmata

Nirmata provides an open platform to deploy, operate, and optimize Kubernetes workloads on any infrastructure. With Nirmata, enterprises can standardize on Kubernetes and decouple applications from infrastructure.

»Octopus Deploy

Octopus Deploy runbook automation minimizes outages and gives you control over your infrastructure and applications. Octopus integrates with your existing infrastructure and includes over 450 automation step templates with a deployment process editor.

»Pure Storage

Pure Storage helps organizations to run their operations as an automated, storage as-a-service model across multiple clouds. Pure helps customers put data to use while reducing the complexity and expense of managing the infrastructure behind it.

»Rafay Systems

Rafay Systems delivers Kubernetes operations and management solutions to corporations. Its flagship product, the Kubernetes Management Cloud is a SaaS platform to manage Kubernetes.

»Spectro Cloud

Spectro Cloud is a Kubernetes management platform providing many options to help enterprises run Kubernetes.

»Shoreline Software

Shoreline Software provides real-time automation and control for cloud operations. Shoreline helps site reliability engineers (SREs) perform real-time fleet-wide debugging of new incidents that arise and then create automated remediations to fix them.

»Valtix

Valtix is a multi-cloud network security platform (CNSP) delivered as a service. Valtix provides cloud network security using the Valtix portal or Terraform provider to enable security infrastructure-as-code.

»New Milestones

We are happy to share that as of August 2021, we now have more than 150 verified Terraform providers.

Interested in making it easier to provision and manage infrastructure as code? Visit registry.terraform.io and check out all of the available Terraform integrations. To verify an existing provider, check out our Terraform Provider Development Program.
author: Alejandra Velasquez
